title: I lost a champion
body: About one month ago i received {{champion:238}}  as a gift with a championship zed skin. Now after the update it's locked and i need to repurchase it. Can u please help me get {{champion:238}}  back.

replies.body: It looks like someone was able to get a few refunds done on your account, but if that wasn't you who did those you should definitely hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can! They'll be able to confirm if you were indeed hacked, and if so they should be able to repair anything the hacker did.
